title: VA - Hot Stuff [CLASSIC ROCK CIRCA 1976] 2 CD Set
description:
1976 in Britain was not only the year of the heatwave but of some of the hottest sounds the decade would produce. Just take a listen to this 2 CD set!

Seed for the entire World to enjoy.


VA - Hot Stuff [A Rock &#039;N&#039; Roll Heatwave] 2 CD&#039;s
